1.name: GPIO 40-pin
1.description: 40-pin GPIO header compatible with Raspberry Pi
1.details:
The ROCK 5T provides a 40-pin GPIO header that is compatible with Raspberry Pi. It includes GPIO, I2C, SPI, UART, PWM, and ADC functions.

Pinout:
- 3.3V, 5V power pins
- GPIO pins (up to 28 GPIOs available)
- I2C interfaces (I2C0, I2C1, I2C2)
- SPI interfaces (SPI0, SPI1)
- UART interfaces (UART0, UART1, UART2, UART3)
- PWM outputs
- ADC inputs (SARADC)

For detailed pin mapping, please refer to the GPIO pinout diagram in the documentation.

2.name: LED Indicators
2.description: Power status and system activity indicators
2.details:
Onboard LED indicators for displaying system status.

LED Description:
- Green LED: Power indicator (steady light means normal power)
- Blue LED: System activity indicator (blinking means normal operation)

These LEDs provide visual feedback of system status.

3.name: USB Type-C
3.description: DP display output and USB 3.0 OTG port
3.details:
Multi-function USB Type-C port supporting video output and data transfer.

Features:
- DisplayPort video output (up to 4K@60Hz)
- USB 3.0 OTG data transfer
- Reversible design
- Supports simultaneous video and data transmission

Can be used for connecting displays or as a USB data port.

4.name: SPI Disable Jumper
4.details:
Jumper cap for disabling SPI function.

Purpose:
- Disable SPI interface function
- Resolve pin conflicts
- Function configuration for specific application scenarios

Please configure according to the manual when needed.

5.name: 3.5mm Audio Jack
5.details:
Standard 3.5mm audio interface.

Functions:
- Stereo output
- Microphone input
- Supports HD audio codec
- Suitable for headphones, speakers, and other audio devices

Provides high-quality audio input and output.

6.name: Power Button
6.details:
Onboard power button for system control.

Functions:
- Long press: Power on/off
- Short press: Wake up system
- LED indicator feedback
- Supports system sleep/wake

Provides convenient system power management.

7.name: PoE Module Connector
7.details:
For connecting PoE (Power over Ethernet) module.

Features:
- Supports IEEE 802.3af/at standards
- Provides Ethernet power supply
- Simplifies wiring requirements
- Suitable for remote deployment scenarios

Requires additional PoE module support.

8.name: HDMI Output
8.details:
HDMI video output port.

Specifications:
- HDMI 2.0 standard
- Supports 4K@60Hz output
- Audio transmission support
- HDCP 2.2 compliant

Used for connecting monitors, TVs, and other display devices.

9.name: USB 3.0 Port
9.details:
USB 3.0 high-speed data interface.

Specifications:
- USB 3.0 SuperSpeed
- Data rate up to 5Gbps
- Backward compatible with USB 2.0/1.1
- Type-A connector

Suitable for external storage, cameras, and other high-speed devices.

10.name: USB 2.0 Port
10.details:
USB 2.0 standard data interface.

Specifications:
- USB 2.0 High Speed
- Data rate up to 480Mbps
- Backward compatible with USB 1.1
- Type-A connector

Suitable for keyboards, mice, and other low-speed devices.

11.name: Gigabit Ethernet
11.details:
Gigabit Ethernet port.

Specifications:
- 10/100/1000Mbps auto-negotiation
- RJ45 connector
- Supports Wake-on-LAN
- IPv4/IPv6 support

Provides stable wired network connection.

12.name: eMMC Socket
12.details:
eMMC 5.1 storage module socket.

Specifications:
- Supports eMMC 5.1 standard
- Transfer rates up to 400MB/s
- Available in various capacities (32GB, 64GB, 128GB)
- Bootable storage option

Provides high-speed onboard storage solution.

13.name: MIPI CSI Camera
13.details:
MIPI CSI-2 camera interface.

Specifications:
- 4-lane MIPI CSI-2
- Supports up to 4K resolution
- Compatible with standard MIPI camera modules
- Data rate: up to 6Gbps

Used for computer vision applications.

14.name: MIPI DSI Display
14.details:
MIPI DSI display panel interface.

Specifications:
- 4-lane MIPI DSI
- Supports up to 1080p resolution
- Compatible with MIPI DSI displays
- Touch panel support through I2C

Used for connecting LCD displays directly to the board.

15.name: PCIe M.2
15.details:
PCIe M.2 Key M slot.

Specifications:
- PCIe 3.0 x4 interface
- Supports NVMe SSDs
- Up to 2TB capacity supported
- Transfer rates up to 4GB/s

Provides ultra-high-speed storage solution.
